task.summary: - JSON Logger with Sensors is now working * I'm not sure if I should support other logging formats. JSON is fine, right? * Maybe reduce the amount of logged stuff a little bit.
- Checking if I should collect Cell Information... I'm inclined to not doing it!
- Checking if I should collect Cell Information... I'm inclined to not doing it!
- Added a few more things to the "pt.unl.fct.di.novalincs.yanux.scavenger.common.cell" package * Actually use and finish the implementation of this package
- Lots of UI fixes but still far from perfect E.g., All ListViews have been replaced by the more modern RecyclerView
- Refactored the whole logging process to make it more stream lined. I still need to test a few edge cases and see how will I deal with polymorphism...
- Refactored the whole logging process to make it more stream lined. I still need to test a few edge cases and see how will I deal with polymorphism...
- Logger now deals well with polymorphism - Release build is now properly supported - ProGuard enabled - ... - Am I missing something?
- WifiActivity now has the screen always on when logging - Copyright Updated
- Restored default gradle.properties. If no problems arise I'll keep them that way. Otherwise I'll enable (some?) "optimizations" suggested on StackOverflow.

MESSAGE.value: - JSON Logger with Sensors is now working * I'm not sure if I should support other logging formats. JSON is fine, right? * Maybe reduce the amount of logged stuff a little bit.
- Checking if I should collect Cell Information... I'm inclined to not doing it!
- Added a few more things to the "pt.unl.fct.di.novalincs.yanux.scavenger.common.cell" package * Actually use and finish the implementation of this package
- Lots of UI fixes but still far from perfect E.g., All ListViews have been replaced by the more modern RecyclerView
- Refactored the whole logging process to make it more stream lined. I still need to test a few edge cases and see how will I deal with polymorphism...
- Logger now deals well with polymorphism - Release build is now properly supported - ProGuard enabled - ... - Am I missing something?
- WifiActivity now has the screen always on when logging - Copyright Updated
- Restored default gradle.properties. If no problems arise I'll keep them that way. Otherwise I'll enable (some?) "optimizations" suggested on StackOverflow.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: - Minor build improvements/fixes
